title: Library Management System
description: Library Management System developed in Java
body: I developed this management system as my final semester project during my freshman year. It aimed to streamline library operations, offering features for book categorization, user management, and transaction tracking. The system was built using Java, featuring a desktop-based interface with graphical user interface (GUI) elements.

title: TASKHUB
body: Taskhub was a collaborative project developed during my third-semester database systems course. It focused on creating a platform for task management, enabling users to create, assign, and track tasks within a team. The application was developed in Java, providing a desktop-oriented solution with a user-friendly GUI.

title: Space Invaders Game
body: This game serves as the culmination of my work in the CS50X course, developed using Python's Pygame library. It involved designing and coding a 2D space invaders game, integrating graphics, sound, and user interaction. The project showcased my proficiency in Python programming and game development.

title: Static Multipage Website
body: I designed and developed my first multi-page static website as an assignment for the CS50x course. The project emphasized web development skills, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Each page contained relevant information, and the website demonstrated my understanding of front-end technologies.

title: Deleted Images Recovery Program
body: A program in C language to recover deleted JPG files from memory. It is designed for digital cameras that use the FAT file system with a block size of 512 bytes. The project showcased my skills in low-level programming and file system handling in a resource-constrained environment.

title: Binance Web App
body: A dynamic web application called CS50's Finance using Flask, Python's web framework. The application incorporates HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jinja, and SQL to provide a robust experience for tracking stock prices, managing a portfolio, and simulating stock trading. The project demonstrated my full-stack development capabilities.
